author: Minou Clark
title: Perrie Edwards And Her New Boyfriend Are Instagram Official
text:
Perrie Edwards And Her New Boyfriend Are Instagram Official It doesn't get more legit than kissing in front of the Eiffel Tower. 02/06/2017 12:03 pm ET Minou Clark Associate Editor of News and Emerging Platforms, The Huffington Post 
The rumor mill can finally be put to rest. Little Mix singer Perrie Edwards and Arsenal soccer star Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain are now Instagram official. 
The pop star and soccer pro were rumored to have been dating since late 2016. After deleting her only photo of Oxlade-Chamberlain from her Instagram, fans thought the couple had split . Well, this new PDA-packed photo makes it clear the two are very much still together. 
Edwards shared a steamy photo on Instagram of her and her beau kissing in Paris with the Eiffel Tower twinkling in the background. It doesn‚Äôt get much more romantic than that. A photo posted by Perrie Edwards ‚úåÔ∏èüåª (@perrieedwards) on Feb 5, 2017 at 12:31am PST 
This is the first really public relationship Edwards has been in since her split from singer Zayn Malik , so it must be getting serious. And just in time for Valentine‚Äôs Day. Related...
